name: Ways of Dying
description:
Note : 

You, the player being an immortal hero, are stuck in a room under water. Your way out? You must find ways to take your life several times in order to unlock the door. 

Maybe one day you will find the famous fatal death...

This game was created for the August Game Jam

Keys : 

Press E to interract

W S D A - to moove around

Shift to swim quickly

Space to swim 

Credits : 

Johantran  : in charge of the code, integration, lightning, music Rhythm

Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/in/johan-tran-a39480206/ 

AllDee : in charge of the 3D modeling, texturing, lightning, music Rhythm

Artstation : https://www.artstation.com/alld 

Install instructions

Install instructions

Download and unzip contents to an empty directory.

Double click on the unity icon, and enjoy !
